name: A Tree Falls in the Forest
name_original: A Tree Falls in the Forest
description:
It's got:

  • five characterful suspects!
  • hundreds of lines of dialogue!
  • some fun twists!
  • some pretty good jokes!
  • a couple neat surprises!

There're no difficult reflex challenges or complex inputs, just a chill and funny and interesting way to spend thirty minutes! How desirable!!

≡

There's an issue with the current build of Godot 4 where the certificate has expired so it flags the windows exe as malware apparently. Sorry about that! It's not really malware! or if it is I don't have anything to do with it. I'll put up a new build when a fix is out!
